item.title: [snc] Cabaretti Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Cabaretti Charm deals damage equal to the number of creatures you control to target creature or planeswalker.

• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

• Create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/magic-story/episode-3-tests-2022-03-30

item.title: [p22] Parallel Lives
item.description:
Enchantment

If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

item.title: [p22] Stranglehold
item.description:
Enchantment

Your opponents can't search libraries.

If an opponent would begin an extra turn, that player skips that turn instead.

item.title: [snc] Obscura Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Return target multicolored permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

• Counter target instant or sorcery spell.

• Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/magic-story/episode-2-dirty-laundry-2022-03-29

item.title: [snc] Maestros Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

• Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

• Maestros Charm deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/magic-story/episode-1-homecoming-2022-03-28

item.title: [clb] Bountiful Promenade
item.description:
Land

Bountiful Promenade enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

Land

Luxury Suite enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [clb] Fireball
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

item.description:

item.title: [clb] Lightning Bolt
item.description:
Instant

Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

item.description:
Instant

item.title: [clb] Ancient Brass Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Elder Dragon

Flying

Whenever Ancient Brass Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. When you do, put any number of target creature cards with mana value X or less from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control, where X is the result.

item.title: [clb] Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Minsc

When Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.

+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.

−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.

Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes can be your commander.

item.title: [clb] Wand of Wonder
item.description:
Artifact

{4}, {T}: Roll a d20. Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card, then shuffles the rest into their library. You may cast up to X instant and/or sorcery spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

1-9 | X is one

10-19 | X is two.

20 | X is three.

item.title: [clb] Elder Brain
item.description:
Creature — Horror

Menace

Whenever Elder Brain attacks a player, exile all cards from that player's hand, then they draw that many cards. You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

item.title: [clb] Elder Brain
item.description:

Whenever Elder Brain attacks a player, exile all cards from that player's hand, then they draw that many cards. You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

item.title: [frf] Citadel Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

• Dragons — At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

item.title: [frf] Palace Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Palace Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

• Dragons — At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [frf] Outpost Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Outpost Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

• Dragons — Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, Outpost Siege deals 1 damage to any target.

item.title: [frf] Monastery Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card.

• Dragons — Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.

item.title: [frf] Frontier Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}.

• Dragons — Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

item.title: [frf] Crux of Fate
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy all Dragon creatures.

• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

item.title: [yneo] Dragonfly Pilot
item.description:
Creature — Fox Pilot

Whenever Dragonfly Pilot enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Dragonfly Suit into your hand.

Dragonfly Pilot crews vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.

https://magic.gg/news/alchemy-kamigawa-previews-at-the-neon-dynasty-championship

item.title: [yneo] Mothrider Cavalry
item.description:
Creature — Human Samurai

This spell costs {2} less to cast if you have no other creature cards in hand or if the only other creature cards in your hand are named Mothrider Cavalry.

Flying

Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

https://magic.gg/news/alchemy-kamigawa-previews-at-the-neon-dynasty-championship

item.title: [yneo] Better Offer
item.description:
Sorcery

Put a random creature card with mana value X or less from target opponent's library onto the battlefield under your control. It perpetually has base power and toughness X/X and perpetually gains ward {1}

item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Whenever Kami of Mourning enters the battlefield, target creature you control or creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "Whenever a creature you control with greater mana value than this card dies, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [yneo] Kami of Bamboo Groves
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Spirit

When Kami of Bamboo Groves enters the battlefield, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

Channel—{2}{G}, Discard Kami of Bamboo Groves: Conjure two cards named Forest into your hand.

item.title: [yneo] Forceful Cultivator
item.description:
Creature — Snake Shaman

This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are no land cards in your hand.

When Forceful Cultivator enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [yneo] Foundry Beetle
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Equipment Insect

First strike

Equipped creature has first strike.

At the beginning of your upkeep, a random artifact in your hand perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

Reconfigure {R}

item.title: [yneo] Fragment Reality
item.description:
Instant

Exile target nontoken artifact, creature, or enchantment. Its controller puts a random creature card with lesser mana value from their library onto the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [yneo] Kami of Transmutation
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

When Kami of Transmutation enters or leaves the battlefield, choose one —

• Each permanent card in your hand perpetually becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

• Each permanent card in your hand perpetually becomes an enchantment in addition to its other types.

https://twitter.com/fffreakmtg/status/1503389275672522754
